features: AMERICA’ TEST KITCHEN “BEST IN SHOW” AWARD WINNER: OXO Non-stick Skillets earned three out of three stars in all categories: capacity, durability, nonstick ability, & ease of use.
HARD ANODIZED BODY: Durable, hard-anodized body delivers excellent heat conduction and incredible scratch-resistance.
SUPERIOR NON-STICK COATING: The three-layer, German-engineered non-stick coating holds up for years of performance using less oil.
STAINLESS STEEL HANDLES: The comfortable stainless steel handles give you a secure and long lasting grip.
VERSATILE DESIGN: These frypans are oven safe up to 430°F and compatible with most stovetops, except induction.
EASY TRANSFERS: The rolled edges offer drip-free pouring for simple, mess-free transfers.
EFFORTLESS CLEANUP: Place in dishwasher when you’re through for simple cleaning.
body.description: The 10" OXO Good Grips Nonstick Pro Frying Pan is ideal for browning ground beef and sautéing vegetables. Our pan features a three layer, German engineered nonstick coating that provides effortless performance while using less oil and delivers quick and easy cleanup. The pan’s scratch resistant, hard anodized body heats faster and more evenly than traditional aluminum, and the stainless steel handle makes oven cooking easy. Dishwasher safe. Oven safe up to 430°F/220°C. Limited lifetime warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top Choice for a Nonstick Pan
reviews.reviewText: This review is for OXO Good Grips Pro 12" Frying Pan Skillet, 3-Layered German Engineered Nonstick Coating, Dishwasher Safe, Oven Safe, Stainless Steel Handle, Black. I purchased this for a house member who really likes nonstick cookware. I ordered this one, because Cook's Illustrated America's Test Kitchen rated it the best. It's a very nice pan, and we have used it many times so far. The nonstick surface is holding up very well, and it is definitely nonstick. We have cooked eggs, meat, chicken, fish, and other items in it. Nothing stuck to the pan. We only hand wash it, and we only use non-metal utensils with it. The weight of the pan is good, and the handle is comfortable and ergonomic. All-in-all this is a great pan if you are looking for something nonstick.A side note about nonstick pans:I am generally not a fan of nonstick pans. I don't like cooking with something that is a part of planned obsolescence. All nonstick cookware slowly starts to wear down with use. It is just the nature of it. So, eventually all nonstick cookware has to be replaced, as eventually it will lose its nonstick properties. This brings me to the other part that I don't like. Nonstick cookware uses chemical products to make it nonstick, and those chemicals wind up in your food. Reports claim the chemicals are safe, but you have to judge your level of confidence in the reports. I don't see a benefit to having added chemicals in my food. Also, you can't use metal utensils with nonstick pans, as the metal will damage the nonstick coating. This generally means one set of non-metal cooking utensils and a separate set of metal utensils to use with your standard cookware. So, I have two sets of cooking utensils. Also, different nonstick cookware will have different maximum temperature ratings. This pan is rated up to 430 F degrees. If you go above that you breakdown the chemical nonstick coating, which not only ruins the nonstick coating, but it also puts those chemicals into your food. I once had a different brand of nonstick pan many years ago that I cooked an omelette in. The nonstick coating had broken down and left all sorts of black flakes on my omelette, so both the omelette and pan went into the garbage. Personally, I prefer to go with a high-quality, multi-clad, stainless steel set of pots & pans that I can use any utensils on that I like and will last me forever. However, if you are going to purchase a nonstick pan this one is an excellent choice because it is a good pan and at a good price point for replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great non stick!
reviews.reviewText: Great pan, super nonstick. I don’t plan on it lasting forever, and don’t expect it to. Super light, great heat distribution and so easy to clean. Use the right utensils (silicone or others meant for nonstick- not stainless) and it will prolong the life of this pan and keep plastics out of your food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Premium non-stick pan at a reasonable price.
reviews.reviewText: This was featured in America's Test Kitchen as their "best value" pick and I agree. There are cheaper pans, but the OXO product is dependable and solid. Try this: take your current non-stick pan and heat it to 350 F and crack an egg right onto it. Dry. No butter, oil or non-stick spray. Make yourself an over-easy egg. Did it release, or make a mess? ATK claims they do this 50 times per pan in their stress test. I tried it, and it works perfectly every time. I didn't realize you could cook eggs without a thick layer of non-stick spray, but this pan does it with ease. The handle is comfortable and makes it easy to manipulate. It's my new 'go-to' pan when it's time to make breakfast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate Your Cooking with Professional Quality!
reviews.reviewText: As a passionate home cook who values performance and convenience, the OXO Good Grips Pro 12" Frying Pan Skillet has become an essential tool in my kitchen, earning a glowing 5-star review! This skillet combines professional quality with user-friendly features, making it a standout choice for all my cooking needs.The 12" size of the OXO Good Grips Pro Frying Pan is perfect for preparing family-sized meals. Its generous surface area allows for even cooking and ample space to toss and stir ingredients.The 3-layered German engineered nonstick coating is simply impressive. It performs flawlessly, ensuring that food doesn't stick to the surface, and making it a breeze to clean after cooking. I can cook with confidence, knowing that my dishes will turn out perfectly and cleanup will be a breeze.The stainless steel handle provides a secure and comfortable grip. Its stay-cool feature allows me to handle the skillet with ease, even when cooking on high heat. The handle is also oven-safe, adding to the skillet's versatility.The performance of the OXO Good Grips Pro Frying Pan is exceptional. It distributes heat evenly across the surface, preventing hot spots and promoting consistent cooking results.The skillet's construction is top-notch, with attention to detail evident in its design and build. The durable materials ensure that the pan will withstand regular use and maintain its quality over time.I love the dishwasher-safe feature of the skillet, making cleanup a breeze on busy days when I don't have the time for handwashing.The black color and sleek design add a touch of sophistication to my kitchen. The OXO Good Grips Pro Frying Pan looks as good as it cooks!In conclusion, the OXO Good Grips Pro 12" Frying Pan Skillet is a must-have for any home cook seeking professional quality and user-friendly features. Its generous size, exceptional nonstick coating, comfortable grip, even heat distribution, oven-safe handle, durable construction, dishwasher-safe feature, and stylish design make it a standout skillet for all your cooking adventures. Elevate your cooking with the OXO Good Grips Pro Frying Pan Skillet - it's a game-changer in the kitchen!

Fast fantastic pan, nothing stuck to it and high heat is not necessary.Cleaning is a breeze, just rinse and wipe... so far**I also got a 10 inch pan and it works great but the handle was bent when I received it, I managed to straighten it by slowly bending it upwards ** for some I could not add a review just for the 10 inch.
Muy recomendado, realmente funciona, no se le pega nada y es fácil de lavar
Great little frypan, cooks everything well

reviews.reviewTitle: Can see why this is highly recommended
reviews.reviewText: This is a replacement after I sent back the pan bought previously due to defects. There was a deep scratch on the coating that was too obvious and may affect the usage. I was refunded shortly after. On the flip side, it shows how thick the coating is which is great, as well as a good reminder to care for pan. But overall, its light, has a good handle and heats up evenly, and with no sticking food. Have had Tefal over the years, but this feels even better to the hands and performs really great in comparison. May get the 12" next, but for now this is good.
重過ぎず、大きさも丁度良く、こびりつきもしないとても使い勝手のよいフライパンです。
